title: [Large-scale] Educational Design Workshop Through Virtual Co-Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design concepts and experience with VR/simulation tools
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to practice stakeholder-engaged educational design in virtual environments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop instructional design scenarios by applying a three-stage (preparation-execution-follow-up) virtual co-creation process.
Learners can produce educational materials reflecting feedback from stakeholders (students, peer experts, etc.) using VR/simulation tools.
Learners can diagnose technical and cultural barriers arising during co-creation processes and propose solutions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
